name: Hello World.  My name is Robert Sosebee
body:
### So you came here to look me up?
Well Hi!  I'm an outdoor enthusiast who loves to code.  I will add some cool outdoorsy helpful applications for the Android Store and Windows Marketplace to @eebesos's account.  Apps for hiking, biking, canoeing, tennis...etc.  Maybe I'll consider using Xamarin to build iOS apps also.  I'll hopefully offer some cool code that you can fork! 

### Work Experience
Team Development Manager - [Assurance Systems, Inc.](http://accuagency.com)

Software Engineer - [Assurance Systems, Inc.](http://.accuagency.com)

Floor Supervisor - [Nike, Inc.](http://news.nike.com/)

Intern - [Daystar Digital](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DayStar_Digital)

### Education
B.S Computer Science - [University of North Georgia](http://ung.edu/)

Project Management Fundamentals Certificate - [University of Georgia](http://www.georgiacenter.uga.edu/)
